net.kuujo.vertigo.util

Interface Observable<T extends Observable<T>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComponentContext<T>, ConnectionContext<T>, Context<T>, InputConnectionContext, InputContext, InputPortContext, InstanceContext, IOContext<T>, ModuleContext, NetworkContext, OutputConnectionContext, OutputContext, OutputPortContext, OutputStreamContext, PortContext<T>, VerticleContext

    public interface Observable<T extends Observable<T>>
    An observable interface. This interface differs from the normal observable in that it allows immutable objects to be "updated" by replacing them with a new updated immutable.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notify(T object)
      Notifies all observers of an update.
      T registerObserver(Observer<T> observer)
      Registers an observer.
      T unregisterObserver(Observer<T> observer)
      Unregisters an observer.
